basics.name: Faiq Shahbaz
basics.summary: Passionate about Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), solver development, and integrating Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) into scientific computing workflows.

work.name: Computational Aeronautics Lab (CAL), NUST
work.summary: Conducting research in Design and development of a small-scale ducted wind turbine
highlights: CFD design and optimization of ducted wind turbines for low wind speed environments
Focused on improving turbine efficiency for low wind speeds in urban settings.

work.name: Dense Fusion
work.summary: Worked on numerical solver development using PETSc and OpenFOAM, with a focus on high-performance computing.
highlights: Developed transport equation solvers in Python with MPI for parallel execution.
Customized OpenFOAM solvers and ran performance tests including scalability analysis.
Collaborated with KAUST faculty on material for computational methods workshops.

work.name: Aviation Training Hub
work.summary: Assisted in mechanical diagnostics and maintenance operations of aircraft systems.
highlights: Troubleshot aircraft systems and improved operational workflows.
Coordinated with engineering teams to support maintenance tasks.

work.name: Pakistan Aeronautical Complex
work.summary: Explored the complete process of aircraft manufacturing, system installation, and interdepartmental coordination.
highlights: Observed aircraft component assembly and system integration.
Gained experience working in multidisciplinary engineering teams.

education.institution: National University of Sciences and Technology (NUST)
courses: High Performance Computing for Computational Engineering

certificates.name: Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification
Predictive Modeling and Machine Learning with MATLAB

volunteer.summary: Led student technical society organizing aerospace-related academic and outreach events.
highlights: Directed planning and execution of campus-wide technical and space outreach events.
Collaborated with faculty and external organizations to host guest lectures and exhibitions.

volunteer.organization: International Conference on Aerospace Science and Engineering (ICASE)
volunteer.summary: Managed event coordination for one of IST's major aerospace conferences.
highlights: Coordinated logistics, speaker sessions, and academic paper submissions.
Worked with multi-functional teams to ensure smooth event operations.

volunteer.summary: Oversaw organization and planning of cultural and academic events for IST Youth Carnival.
Organized educational and outreach activities for World Space Week at IST.
